# Star Awards 1994

Star Awards 1994 is the first edition of the annual Star Awards presented by the Singapore Broadcasting Corporation to honour its artistes who work on Channel 8. A total of 16 awards were given out at the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-

! style="width=50%" | Most Popular Female Artiste
